articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Microsoft exploit could control Bing search results and Office 365 data - The Verge
articles.description: A misconfiguration of Microsoft’s Azure platform resulted in a vulnerability that allowed users to freely change Bing search results and access Outlook emails and OneDrive data.
articles.content:
Huge Microsoft exploit allowed users to manipulate Bing search results and access Outlook email accounts
